mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (member_id, free_board_id, content, created_at, modified_at) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{freeBoardId}, #{comment.content}, NOW(), null)
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, m.name AS 'member.name', m.member_id AS 'member.memberId' FROM comment c LEFT JOIN member m on c.member_id = m.member_id WHERE free_board_id = #{freeBoardId}
SELECT * FROM comment WHERE comment_id = #{commentId} AND member_id = #{memberId}
